overview: A woman who models hands is suddenly kidnapped and her right hand is amputated by a mad scientist who wants to take the beautiful hand for himself. When the scientist's assistant realises that the woman will die if he leaves her alone, he takes steps to save her... In the end, the film ends up as a profound love story. The film ends with a profound love story. The filmmaker's attention to detail and taste is astonishing.
title: The Twin Insect
